channel.title: Passwords
channel.description: My parents just update to wirless internet, and the dude set like a password on the computure. Its window's xp. Is there anyway to recover it?

item.title: Passwords
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Most administrator account do actually have a password you know… my xp partition has and i cant even remember it…

Anyway, just google it.

Read full topic

item.title: Passwords
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“Fireninja4000, post:3, topic:103078”][quote author=io9 link=topic=147595.msg1403325#msg1403325 date=1180594385]
Reboot into Safe Mode. (Hold F8 While your computer is starting up)
Choose “Safe Mode”

Log in as username Administrator w/ no password.

Then, open up Command Pro,pt and type in

net user

the password won’t sow up when you have to retype it.
now reboot, and there we goe
[/quote]

Hacker In The Makeing :)[/quote]

No, not really.

Read full topic
